name: seperate the red blocks
description:
1. Game's Goal

This games goal is "To make seperated red blocks"

1-1 How to make seperated red blocks?

If you want to make seperated red blocks, You should bump to red block.

If you are bumpimg, It aloud a sound. it sounds like zzing---zzing

you should be bumping until clear Level.

2. Mint Blocks and Switch

If you arrived in Level 2, there may are mint blocks and a button.

If you bump the button, it aloud a sound likes chak, button's color will change and mint blocks will be disappear.

3. Guns and Multi-Switch

If you arrived in Level 4, There may are orange switch and gun. the multi-switch deletes many mint blocks.

The gun is using for reaching the Unreachable.

if you hit the switch with a bullet, It affects like bumping switch.

3-1 How to fire the bullet

If you Click right mouse button, The bullet will appear and bullet goes to right.

And, If you click left mouse button, the bullet will appear and the bullet will move to the left.

4. Die Button

If you hit Die button, Player will die and level will restart.
